articles.description: 'We had the privilege of meeting the great man and his family at the airport today. Dhoni was returning home after surgery.'
articles.content:
Photograph: Kind courtesy Mohammad Kaif/Instagram
Mohammad Kaif had a delightful encounter with Mahendra Singh Dhoni at Mumbai airport.
Both cricketers, accompanied by their families, crossed paths… [+467 chars]
